response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item comes with a host of features that we believe will greatly benefit you. Given its quality and the value it offers, I am extending an initial offer of $12,000 for the product. I look forward to your response and hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.", "product_price": 12000}
